Policy restriction contract details.

Azure REST API version: 2024-06-01-preview. Prior API version in Azure Native 2.x: 2023-05-01-preview.

Other available API versions: 2023-05-01-preview.

These versions are not included in the SDK but you can generate them as a local SDK package; see the [version guide](../../../version-guide/#accessing-any-api-version-via-local-packages) for details.

```csharp
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using Pulumi;
using AzureNative = Pulumi.AzureNative;

return await Deployment.RunAsync(() => 
{
    var policyRestriction = new AzureNative.ApiManagement.PolicyRestriction("policyRestriction", new()
    {
        PolicyRestrictionId = "policyRestriction1",
        RequireBase = AzureNative.ApiManagement.PolicyRestrictionRequireBase.@True,
        ResourceGroupName = "rg1",
        Scope = "Sample Path to the policy document.",
        ServiceName = "apimService1",
    });

});


```

```go
package main

import (
	apimanagement "github.com/pulumi/pulumi-azure-native-sdk/apimanagement/v2"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := apimanagement.NewPolicyRestriction(ctx, "policyRestriction", &apimanagement.PolicyRestrictionArgs{
			PolicyRestrictionId: pulumi.String("policyRestriction1"),
			RequireBase:         pulumi.String(apimanagement.PolicyRestrictionRequireBaseTrue),
			ResourceGroupName:   pulumi.String("rg1"),
			Scope:               pulumi.String("Sample Path to the policy document."),
			ServiceName:         pulumi.String("apimService1"),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}

```


</pulumi-choosable>

## Supporting Types



<h4 id="policyrestrictionrequirebase">
Policy<wbr>Restriction<wbr>Require<wbr>Base<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="python,go" class="inline">, Policy<wbr>Restriction<wbr>Require<wbr>Base<wbr>Args</pulumi-choosable>
</h4>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">
<dl class="tabular"><dt>@True</dt>
    <dd>trueThe policy is required to have base policy</dd><dt>@False</dt>
    <dd>falseThe policy does not require to have base policy</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="go">
<dl class="tabular"><dt>Policy<wbr>Restriction<wbr>Require<wbr>Base<wbr>True</dt>
    <dd>trueThe policy is required to have base policy</dd><dt>Policy<wbr>Restriction<wbr>Require<wbr>Base<wbr>False</dt>
    <dd>falseThe policy does not require to have base policy</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="java">
<dl class="tabular"><dt>True_</dt>
    <dd>trueThe policy is required to have base policy</dd><dt>False_</dt>
    <dd>falseThe policy does not require to have base policy</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="javascript,typescript">
<dl class="tabular"><dt>True</dt>
    <dd>trueThe policy is required to have base policy</dd><dt>False</dt>
    <dd>falseThe policy does not require to have base policy</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="python">
<dl class="tabular"><dt>TRUE</dt>
    <dd>trueThe policy is required to have base policy</dd><dt>FALSE</dt>
    <dd>falseThe policy does not require to have base policy</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="yaml">
<dl class="tabular"><dt>"true"</dt>
    <dd>trueThe policy is required to have base policy</dd><dt>"false"</dt>
    <dd>falseThe policy does not require to have base policy</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

## Import



An existing resource can be imported using its type token, name, and identifier, e.g.

```sh
$ pulumi import azure-native:apimanagement:PolicyRestriction policyRestrictions1 /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ApiManagement/service/{serviceName}/policyRestrictions/{policyRestrictionId} 
```


To learn more about importing existing cloud resources, see [Importing resources](/docs/using-pulumi/adopting-pulumi/import/).

<dl class="package-details">
	<dt>Repository</dt>
	<dd><a href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-azure-native">Azure Native pulumi/pulumi-azure-native</a></dd>
	<dt>License</dt>
	<dd>Apache-2.0</dd>
</dl>
